name: ルナティックドーン 前途への道標
description: Small tales add up to create a history that is all your own. Your mission is to seize the key of fate and build the history of this land.This game is only available in Japanese.
minimum_requirements: OS: Japanese Windows 8（32&64bit）/ 7（32&64bit）/ Vista（32bit） / XP / 2000 Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: 640x480x256 DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 190 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound 8.0+ compatible Additional Notes:
recommended_requirements: OS: Japanese Windows 8（32&64bit）/ 7（32&64bit）/ Vista（32bit） / XP / 2000 Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 190 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound 8.0+ compatible Additional Notes:
